DOC.brief_summary: To analyze the alterations of physiologic variables in healthy sedentary women in the Shuttle Walk Test, verify the distance reached and interruption causes of the test.
DOC.brief_title: Physiologic Variables in Healthy Women in Shuttle Walk Test
DOC.detailed_description: The Shuttle Walk Test requires patients to walk at a gradually increasing speed, up and down a 10 meter corridor identified by two marker cones, until they reach a symptom limited maximum. The walking speed was externally paced and controlled by a series of beeps played on a compact disk.
DOC.criteria: 1. Inclusion criteria: 1. female gender; 2. sedentary; 3. aged 20 to 30 years. 2. Exclusion criteria: 1. pregnancy; 2. enrolment in any regular physical activity program; 3. diagnosed health conditions.
